mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (entity_type,entity_id, user_id,content, parent_id ) VALUES (#{entityType}, #{entityId}, #{userId}, #{content},#{parentId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, entity_type, entity_id, user_id, parent_id, content, is_deleted, create_time FROM comment WHERE entity_type = #{entityType} AND entity_id = #{entityId} AND parent_id IS NULL AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, entity_type, entity_id, user_id, parent_id, content, is_deleted, create_time FROM comment WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
